channel.title: Starting Outfit Help
channel.description: I WANT TO KNOW WHERE YOU GO TO CHANGE YOUR STARTING OUTFIT AND LEVEL UP TO 90 WHEN CREATING ACCOUNT?

item.title: Starting Outfit Help
item.dc:creator: @Epic_Ancient Epic Ancient
item.description:
@Epic_Ancient wrote:

Player.java

Press CTRL + F and search any one of these lines:

playerEquipment[playerHat]= playerEquipment[playerCape]= playerEquipment[playerAmulet]= playerEquipment[playerChest]= playerEquipment[playerShield]= playerEquipment[playerLegs]= playerEquipment[playerHands]= playerEquipment[playerFeet]= playerEquipment[playerRing]= playerEquipment[playerArrows]= playerEquipment[playerWeapon]=

After the = should be some numbers; those are the item IDs of what the players start with.
Change them to the item IDs you want people to start with, then compile your server and run.

â€“You already have an active topic; from now on, post all your server-related problems in one topic.

Read full topic
